thread.title_full: Luật đồng màu đông chất chỉ có trong chơi tiến lên miền Bắc

posts.author: anhthotm
posts.title: Luật đồng màu đông chất chỉ có trong chơi tiến lên miền Bắc
posts.text:
Tiến lên miền bắc là 1 trò chơi khá phổ biến ở Việt Nam. Tiến lên miền bắc khác với danh bai tien len mien nam online ở điểm gì. Chắc chắn không rất nhiều\ người nắm rõ về điểm này. Vậy hãy cùng chúng tôi tìm hiểu về luật đồng màu đồng chất để biết về sự khác nhau này.
Luật đồng màu đông chất chỉ có trong chơi tiến lên miền Bắc
Trong tiến liên miền nam chỉ cần so sánh độ to lớn các lá, ko cần lưu ý đến chất của lá bài. Với tiến lên miền bắc thì ngược lại. người chơi tiến lên muốn chặn được bài người khác thì phải đánh các lá hoặc các bộ cùng chất với lá hoặc bộ của người cửa trước.
Ví dụ: Người A, B cùng chơi tiến lên, A là người đánh trước, B đánh sau.
– A đánh 5♠ thì B bắt buộc phải đánh các lá có độ lớn hơn 5 và phải cùng chất bích. VD: B có 6♠, 8♠…
– trường hợp đôi thì sao. A đánh đôi 4 đỏ 4♥ 4♦ thì B muốn chặn thì bắt buộc phải đánh các đôi có độ lớn hơn 4. VD: B có đôi 5 đỏ 5♥ 5♦ , đôi 6 đỏ 6♥ 6♦ ….
– Ngoại lệ: Trong tiến lên miền Bắc ko cho phép các lá không cùng màu kết hợp khiến đôi. VD: 4♠ kết hợp với 4 ♥. 5♣ kết hợp với 5♦.
– tình huống 3 lá. A đánh 3 lá 6 bao gồm 6♠ 6♦ 6♣ thì B muốn chặn thì B bắt buộc phải có 3 lá có độ to hơn 6 và chất cũng phải giống với 3 lá 6 mà A có. VD: B có 7♠ 7♦ 7♣ hoặc At♠ At♦ At♣.
– tình huống dây đồng chất. A đánh 4♠ 5♠ 6♠ thì B muốn chặn được thì B phải có bộ 3 lá to hơn và phải cùng chất bích. VD: B có 7♠ 8♠ 9♠ hoặc Q♠ K♠ Át♠.
Với những chia sẻ của chúng tôi trên đây sẽ giúp game thủ có được các kinh nghiệm hữu ích về danh bai truc tuyen

posts.title: Şile’de batan gemiden bir kişinin daha cesedine ulaşıldı
posts.text:
Şile’de batan gemiden bir kişinin daha cesedine ulaşıldı Şile açıklarında batan gemide arama çalışmaları devam ederken bir kişinin daha cesedine ulaşıldı. Acı haber alan aile yakınları göz yaşlarını tutamadı.  40 
Şile açıklarında batan gemide arama çalışmaları devam ederken bir kişinin daha cesedine ulaşıldı. Acı haber alan aile yakınları göz yaşlarını tutamadı. 
İstanbul Şile açıklarında batan gemide arama çalışmaları devam ediyor. Arama kurtarma ekipleri kaybolan bir mürettebatın daha cesedine ulaştı. Endişeli bekleyişleri süren mürettebatın yakınları, acı haberi aldıklarında gözyaşlarını tutamadı. Arama kurtarma çalışmalarına ilişkin bilgiler veren Şile Kaymakamı Salih Yüce, bir vatandaşın daha cesedine ulaşıldığını, çalışmaların aralıksız sürdüğünü söyledi. 
Öte yandan arama faaliyetleri sonucunda 4 mürettebatın cesedine ulaşılmış oldu. (İHA)

thread.section_title: Wilderness Blues- Ramblings from the Great Land
thread.title: My Dog is Sick
thread.title_full: My Dog is Sick

posts.author: tbbotts (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: My Dog is Sick
posts.text: A few weeks ago, Jan and I decided to send in our eleven year old daschund, Rigby, in to the vets. He'd been having problems with peeing on the floor, and getting up two or three times a night to go outside to pee. We noticed that he was drinking an uncommon amount of water as well. Needless to say, the interruptions played havoc with our sleep patterns. Jan was gone for a few weeks, so all the babysitting was left to me. I slept with the bedroom  door slightly cocked open so he could push his way in and wake me up in the night. It wasn't any too restful to say the least. On more than one occasion he pushed open the door after he had already peed on the floor outside my room. Lovely. Anyway, we finally decided to send him in and see what the vet had to say. I was reluctant to send him in, I knew the bill would be a doozy, and I also hate to put him through the trauma of going into a kennel and transporting him on the plane. I'd rather be in the cage myself. I know, I know, he's terribly spoiled. I knew that would happen if I had a dog. I also knew that vet bills would be part of having a pet, and that when a mammal eats, it also produces waste. All things that I didn't want to deal with. Just today I was checking the anti-freeze in the truck when I stepped in a pile. I was really happy to have to find an old tooth brush and give my shoe a thorough cleaning during my lunch hour. I just finished and decided to don my slippers and go back to finish the job. I promptly found another pile hidden in the gravel of the driveway. I love my dog dearly, but I'll never have another. My heart will break when he passes on, but as we enter our golden years, there is less and less gold to go around, and his latest vet bill is going to set us back about $1,000.00. Plus his meds, which apparently he has to be on for the remainder of his life, costs an additional $72.00 a month. The hits just keep on coming folks. The bottom line is that he has Cushing's Disease. I guess it's caused by small tumors on the pituitary gland, causing it to put out too much  cortisol. The end result is the uncommon thirst, the need to urinate frequently, a rather large abdomen (not totally the result of the disease), and some hair loss. As it was, he was already taking thyroid medicine. Two pills a day. He has hypothyroidism. Unbelievably, so do Jan and I. All three of us are taking meds for it. What are the odds? In any event, if things keep going the way they are, all three of us will be sharing  the dog food, because we won't be able to afford both the medicine and food. Isn't life grand?

posts.author: simond2002
posts.title: Questions/Help about Metatrader 4 - Page 3
posts.text:
Hi dukas_trader,
I have a question about MT4 strategy tester.
Strategy tester was always clunky when I used it but I was able to get by because most of the time I only used it to observe price moving more quickly than real-time. Unfortunately even most of that functionality has now gone with the current build (1090).
I did buy Forex Tester and at first liked it but now loathe it! I find it a very difficult program to work with, almost impossible to import my broker's 5 digit data and most annoyingly, supdem, which is the only indicator I use, doesn't work in Forex Tester (a few of us did try and port supdem into Forex Tester but with little success - the program runs so slowly it's practically useless).
I want to be able to observe price moving at faster than realtime in MT4 with supdem using my broker's 5 digit data. I'd also like to be able to pause playback. Do you know if there's any way to do this?
Cheers
Edit:
Spent a bit of time this morning checking over some other forums and found the answer, which is quite simple. In the later builds, the strategy tester window loads in a compressed fashion and just needs expanding. An easy solution, but easy to miss as well. The old issue of being able to properly adjust the speed of playback still exists but I can work with that. Have included screen grab for thread:
Attached Image (click to enlarge)

posts.author: webinfo@adnkronos.com
posts.title: Blocco età pensione, secondo round
posts.text:
Blocco età pensione, secondo round Blocco età pensione, secondo round ECONOMIA 
(Fotogramma) Pubblicato il: 07/11/2017 07:01 
Entra nel vivo il confronto tra governo e sindacati sull' adeguamento dell'età pensionabile all'aspettativa di vita . Dopo il primo round svoltosi ieri , oggi a Palazzo Chigi si tornerà a discutere della possibilità di esentare dall'automatismo previsto dalla riforma Fornero - che dal 2019 porterà a 67 anni l'accesso alla pensione - i lavoratori che svolgono mansioni 'usuranti'. L'Esecutivo dovrebbe presentare una proposta con cui identificare la platea e i requisiti di accesso ai lavori gravosi . Una platea finora ricondotta alle undici categorie già ammesse all'Ape social , ed "estremamente limitata" secondo i sindacati, che potrebbe essere ampliata. Nonostante il monito del presidente dell'Istat Giorgio Alleva, secondo cui "non basta stabilire le categorie ma bisogna stabilire il percorso delle persone , quanto si è stati in quella posizione" per poter identificare le differenze di alcune professioni rispetto alla speranza di vita. 
Tra gli argomenti di cui si potrebbe discutere oggi anche la possibilità di abbassare l'età pensionabile qualora la speranza di vita risulti in calo . Al momento la legge considera solo il meccanismo inverso, ovvero il calcolo al rialzo. Ma ora l'Istat, proprio nei primi 6 mesi di quest'anno, ha certificato oltre 28mila decessi in più rispetto al 2016. Restano fuori dalla discussione invece, almeno per il momento, altri temi caldi della 'fase due' del confronto , tra cui le future pensioni dei giovani, la disparità di genere e il rilancio della previdenza complementare. Ma i round tecnici sulle pensioni si susseguiranno fino al 13 novembre, data dell'incontro più strettamente politico. Un lavoro impegnativo per il quale i sindacati sono pronti "ad andare ad oltranza". E, in assenza di risposte tecniche esaustive, a chiedere lo "slittamento" del decreto direttoriale con cui aumentare a 67 anni dal 2019 l'età pensionabile oltre il 31 dicembre prossimo, data in cui il governo dovrebbe emanare il decreto.

posts.title: 雅思考试受考生热捧华南片区考试将大力扩容
posts.text:
[这个贴子最后由凯恩雅思在 2006/11/16 09:54am 第 1 次编辑] uÈÊÌÙ©V[bbs.chuguo.cnCvºWÕØÀzÎ
uÈÊÌÙ©V[bbs.chuguo.cnCvºWÕØÀzÎ
 随着移民和留学市场的走热，雅思考试在国内受到追捧，华南地区的考生今年有大幅增长，主办方正考虑增加考点或考试次数，以满足不断增长的需求。 uÈÊÌÙ©V[bbs.chuguo.cnCvºWÕØÀzÎ
日前在深圳举办的国际教育展上，英国驻广州总领事馆文化教育领事Jim Hollington透露说，目前选择英国做为留学目的地的中国考生正在增加，是带动雅思考试人数增长的原因之一。雅思考试在各个领域和领域的广泛认可，直接推动了考生人数的增加，雅思考试可能于明年初在华南扩容。 uÈÊÌÙ©V[bbs.chuguo.cnCvºWÕØÀzÎ
 据Hollingtong领事介绍，广东和福建是华南地区雅思考生人数增长最快的两个地区。截止10月底，广东省参加雅思考试的人数比去年同期增长40%，仅深圳市的增幅为60%。 uÈÊÌÙ©V[bbs.chuguo.cnCvºWÕØÀzÎ
目前，广东省只有广州和深圳两个考点，英国驻广州总领事馆文化教育处透露可能会在华南五省区的范围内增加一个考点，具体地点仍在考察中。今年夏天以来，为了应对深圳考生人数增加的情况，主办方已经通过增加座位或考试场次的方式来“扩大容量”。明年更比今年增加了两个考试日期，为考生提供更多选择。 uÈÊÌÙ©V[bbs.chuguo.cnCvºWÕØÀzÎ
 据了解，截止到10月底，深圳除12月2日的雅思考试仅余少量座位外，年底前的考试报名基本告满。2007年1月13日的考场也基本预定完毕，2月10日以后的考试方有较多空余。
留学走热促使考试升温 uÈÊÌÙ©V[bbs.chuguo.cnCvºWÕØÀzÎ
 今年的国际教育展上，英国总领事馆文化教育处率41所英国院校赴深参展，阵容强大，几占全部展商的半壁江山。Hollingtong领事说，今年中国学生赴英留学的人数比去年同期增长超过30%。截止今年8月底，全国签证评价成功率达到86%，华南地区更高达91%，而且有更多的中国学生正在申请赴英学习，其中来自深圳的学生也正在增长。 uÈÊÌÙ©V[bbs.chuguo.cnCvºWÕØÀzÎ
 “深圳最早来深圳创业的‘年轻’一代的下一代已经长大，到了可以考虑出国留学的年龄，而且这一群体正在增加，所以，我们对深圳的市场非常乐观。”Hollingtong领事还认为，深圳开放的移民文化使得人们在挑选出国留学目的地时较少地域偏见，而更注重教育质量，这正是英国教育获得青睐的原因。 uÈÊÌÙ©V[bbs.chuguo.cnCvºWÕØÀzÎ
 业内人士认为，客观上，由于国内的大学今年普遍停止扩招，迫使部分考生将目光投向国外。留学市场经历过数年低迷后，国内很多家长和学生开始重新认识到海外教育经历的价值，但是在选择学校时则变得更为挑剔和精明，更注重选择适合学生个人爱好和特点的专业方向，而不是盲目崇拜名校。 uÈÊÌÙ©V[bbs.chuguo.cnCvºWÕØÀzÎ
 uÈÊÌÙ©V[bbs.chuguo.cnCvºWÕØÀzÎ
考试权威满足多种需求 uÈÊÌÙ©V[bbs.chuguo.cnCvºWÕØÀzÎ
 雅思的走热，除留学因素外，还和移民和英语爱好者相关。据英国驻广州总领事馆文化教育处考试部分析，雅思考试已经得到全球4000多个机构和几乎所有英语国家移民局和政府部门的认可，这些国家包括澳大利亚、加拿大、新西兰、英国和美国。今年来，国内的雅思考生里出现了前往美国的新趋势，据统计数字显示，使用雅思申请美国的考生比去年同期翻了一番。 uÈÊÌÙ©V[bbs.chuguo.cnCvºWÕØÀzÎ
 由于加拿大、澳大利亚等国近期放宽对技术移民的资格要求，间接导致深圳报考雅思人士增长。另外，雅思考试也成为许多年轻白领和学生证实自己英语水平的重要依据，很多英语爱好者已不满足于通过大学英语四、六级考试，考雅思作为英语水平证明以用于求职的，这部分考生在深圳雅思考试中也占有相当比例。 uÈÊÌÙ©V[bbs.chuguo.cnCvºWÕØÀzÎ

Lapangan permainan
Untuk pertandingan internasional dewasa, lapangan sepak bola internasional yang digunakan memiliki panjang yang berkisar antara 100-120 meter dan lebar 65-75 meter.[11] Di bagian tengah kedua ujung lapangan, terdapat area gawang yang berupa persegi empat berukuran dengan lebar 7.32 meter dan tinggi 2.44 meter.[11] Di bagian depan dari gawang terdapat area penalti yang berjarak 16.5 meter dari gawang.[11] Area ini merupakan batas kiper boleh menangkap bola dengan tangan dan menentukan kapan sebuah pelanggaran mendapatkan hadiah tendangan penalti atau tidak.[11]

thread.section_title: Česká škola
thread.title: Reportéři ČT: Když se řekne inkluze
thread.title_full: Reportéři ČT: Když se řekne inkluze

posts.author: Michal Komárek (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Reportéři ČT: Když se řekne inkluze
posts.text:
„Školy dostaly v loňském roce 2 miliardy korun na takzvanou inkluzi, tedy začlenění žáků se speciálními potřebami do normální výuky. Politicky výbušné téma rozděluje politiky i společnost. Jaké zkušenosti mají školy, které inkluzi praktikují už dlouhá léta, zjišťovala Jana Neumannová,“ uvedl včerejší reportáž České televize Marek Wollner.




„Inkluze je dnes velké politické téma. Její zastánci říkají, že je prostě normální, aby se zdravé děti vzdělávaly spolu s postiženými. Odpůrci kritizují novelu platnou od roku 2016. Jde podle nich o násilný přesun postižených dětí ze speciálních škol do běžných. A systém na to není připravený. K nejhlasitějším kritikům patří Václav Klaus mladší. Pro náš pořad ale odmítl mluvit,“ říká redaktorka Jana Neumannová. 

Václav Klaus mladší : „Nechci ve vašem pořadu účinkovat. Nepovažuji ho za objektivní.“ 

V reportáži vystupuje také Václav Krása , předseda Národní rady osob se zdravotním postižením ČR: „Nerozumím tomu, co těm kritikům na tom inkluzivním společném vzdělávání vadí. Já tomu fakt nerozumím. Možná, že to stojí nějaké peníze, na druhou stranu to dává podstatně více šancí těm lidem, aby uspěli v životě. To je nepochybné. To je prostě nepochybné. Já si troufnu říci, že v tom minulém režimu ti lidé měli minimální šanci, pokud byli s těžším zdravotním postižením, aby uspěli v životě. Dneska tu šanci dostávají,“ říká v reportáži Krása. 

Na jeden ze základních problémů inkluze z pohledu kritiků, upozorňuje v reportáži Martin Odehnal , předseda Asociace speciálních pedagogů: „Ve Finsku nebo ve Švédsku fungují v jedné třídě dva ty pedagogové. Vedle toho běžného ten speciální a každý se věnuje té skupině, na kterou je jaksi odborně kvalifikován. Tak u nás to všechno spadlo na toho učitele. To je ten naprosto zásadní moment. Ty děti jsou vzdělávány nekvalifikovaně,“ říká Odehnal. 

Na tento argument navazuje poslanec za KDU-ČSL Jiří Mihola : „Takto plošně říci, prostě inkluze neboli společné vzdělávání se bude provádět na všech školách, když ty podmínky nejsou, a dostatek speciálních pedagogů také ne, v tom vidím obrovský problém, a, a proto žádáme ten stop stav, vyhodnocení a revizi inkluze.“

„Tomu nerozumím. Jak pozastavit? To by se musely stopnout peníze a zakázalo by se těm dětem vzdělávat? Rozumíte, co to je pozastavit?“, reaguje Václav Krása . 

Celá reportáž je ke stažení zde

thread.section_title: Root Nation
thread.title: Опыт эксплуатации Huawei Nova 2 – почти флагман и намного дешевле
thread.title_full: Опыт эксплуатации Huawei Nova 2 – почти флагман и намного дешевле

posts.author: Vladislav Surkov
posts.title: Опыт эксплуатации Huawei Nova 2 – почти флагман и намного дешевле
posts.text:
Так получилось, что мне пришлось на некоторое время расстаться с Huawei P10 Plus и пересесть на более простой смартфон – Huawei Nova 2 ( читать обзор ). И самое удивительное, что я не почувствовал болезненного даунгрейда при таком переходе и вполне комфортно прожил с этим аппаратом больше месяца. Такой факт настолько меня поразил, что я решил написать свой отзыв о данном устройстве. Конечно, Nova 2 по всем параметрам уступает текущим флагманам, но настолько ли это критично для обычного нетребовательного пользователя? Попробуем разобраться.

В данном обзоре я не буду останавливаться подробно на характеристиках смартфона – если есть желание, с этой информацией можно ознакомиться в нашем редакционном обзоре, который был опубликован ранее. Я же расскажу о нюансах использования Huawei Nova 2 и своих впечатлениях от устройства.
Читайте также: Обзор Huawei Nova 2 

Huawei Nova 2 – для любителей классики Гибрид iPhone 6 и 7 на Android хотели? Huawei Nova 2 способен обмануть даже достаточно опытных наблюдателей, если вы будете умело прикрывать от них 2 зоны. Первая – ниже экрана, где нет сканера Touch ID, зато есть надпись Huawei. А вторая – блок сдвоенной камеры и сканер отпечатков сзади.
Конечно, отличий на самом деле намного больше, при желании вы cможете их все найти. Но смысл не в этом. Huawei Nova 2 – до скучного классический смартфон без какой-либо внешней изюминки. Да, он эксплуатирует дизайн Apple 4-летней давности, немного переработанный и доработанный в лучшую сторону. Но кроме внешнего вида он воплотил в себе и все лучшие особенности конструкции – цельнометаллический корпус, который ладно скроен и крепко сшит.
Несмотря на то, что Nova 2 не флагман, сборка у него вполне флагманская, как и подбор материалов. И лишь хлипкий пластиковый лоток для сим-карт выдает среднебюджетное решение. Но кто будет присматриваться к таким мелочам?

В любом случае, смартфон просто красивый, этого у него не отнять – тонкий скругленный корпус, симметричный спереди и минималистичный сзади. Тактильно гладкий и зализанный – очень приятный на ощупь. Просто подержите Huawei Nova в руках и вы поймете, о чем я говорю. В такой аппарат очень легко влюбиться после первого знакомства.

Для тех, кто устал от огромных смартфонов Последние несколько лет я довольно часто слышу в интернете претензии, что флагманы стали большими. Хочешь производительный смартфон – автоматически получай большой экран. Где же компактные гаджеты? В стане Apple эту нишу занимает обычный iPhone и модель SE. В лагере Android с этим дела обстоят хуже. Huawei Nova 2 – частичный ответ на запрос подобных покупателей.

Аппарат действительно компактный и им легко управлять одной рукой – cвоеобразный эргономический Эдем, в который попадаешь, когда начинаешь пользоваться этим устройством после огромных лопат.
Достать пальцем до шторки – да проще простого. Попасть в любой элемент интерфейса на экране вверху – легко. А еще физические кнопки – они расположены идеально на правой грани смартфона и отлично нащупываются вслепую.

Сканер отпечатков тоже расположен в удобном месте сзади. Но к нему надо привыкнуть, так как утоплен он в корпус совсем немного. Поначалу кажется, что “плоский сканер” неудобен и его сложно найти, но через несколько дней использования появляется тактильная память и отпадают все претензии по этому поводу. Кстати, срабатывает сканер молниеносно – как у любого флагмана компании.

Для тех, кто ищет качественный дисплей В Huawei Nova 2 установлен LTPS IPS LCD дисплей 1920 х 1080 точек. Разрешение экрана тут вполне приличное, как для 5-дюймового устройства. Плотность пикселей просто превосходная – 443 ppi – изображения и шрифты выглядят очень четко.

Реальные эксплуатационные особенности дисплея на высоте – углы обзора отличные, максимальной яркости хватает для использования в солнечный день, а минимальный уровень комфортный в темноте. Адаптивная регулировка подсветки работает без вопросов. Кроме того есть ночной режим и тонкая настройка цветовой температуры экрана.

Конечно, при прямом сравнении с флагманами, дисплей Nova 2 немного проигрывает визуально, однако в своей ценовой категории, это точно одно из лучших предложений по качеству картинки.
Также, раз уж речь идет о дисплее, стоит отметить наличие олеофобного покрытия стекла. Палец скользит отлично, поверхность вытирается легко.
Для тех, кто не играет в игры Нет, конечно, играть на этом смартфоне можно, но обычно геймеры покупают смартфоны с экранами побольше. Все-таки размер 5 дюймов предполагает, что аппарат скорее имиджевый, чем игровой.
Железо в смартфоне установлено среднее – это четырехъядерный процессор HiSilicon Kirin 659 и ускоритель Mali-T830 MP2, что также указывает на то, что устройство не рассчитано на серьезный гейминг. Тем не менее, в реальной работе Huawei Nova 2 ведет себя очень шустро. По ощущениям – работает вполне на уровне флагманов.
Кроме того, 4 ГБ оперативной памяти обеспечивают хороший уровень многозадачности. А 64 ГБ постоянной – позволяют отказаться от использования microSD в большинстве случаев. Но если вам все-таки нужно больше, тогда можно установить карту памяти до 256 ГБ, правда придется пожертвовать второй сим-картой.
Для тех, кто любит фотографировать Вообще, производитель в рекламе Huawei Nova 2 делает упор на фронтальную камеру, которая тут разрешением аж 20 Мп, то есть любителям селфи этот смартфон должен понравиться. Кроме того есть настройки для улучшения селфи по ходу съемки и портретный режим с размытием фона.

Но я не любитель снимать себя, поэтому в первую очередь оценил возможности основного сдвоенного модуля. Он в Huawei Nova 2 не комплектуется именитой оптикой LEICA, но сама по себе камера вполне приличная – 12 Мп и 8 Мп, размер пикселей 1.25 µm, аппертура f/1.8 и фазовый автофокус.

На практике смартфон способен делать отличные фото с хорошим динамическим диапазоном. При хорошем освещении – практически на флагманском уровне. При плохом освещении – тоже неплохие, но падает детализация и появляются шумы. Вообще, основной недостаток камеры, конечно – отсутствие оптической стабилизации. Поэтому, чтобы сделать хороший снимок надо иметь твердую руку или использовать серийную съемку, чтобы потом выбрать лучший кадр.
За счет использования второго модуля можно делать фото с эффектом широкой диафрагмы – для размытия фона, и менять точку фокусировки на уже готовых снимках в галерее.
СМОТРЕТЬ ПРИМЕРЫ ФОТО В ПОЛНОМ РАЗРЕШЕНИИ 
СМОТРЕТЬ ПРИМЕРЫ ФОТО В ПОЛНОМ РАЗРЕШЕНИИ 
Что касается видеосъемки – тут смартфон также показывает неплохие результаты, но конечное качество снова же упирается в отсутствие оптической стабилизации. Ролики снятые с рук получаются слишком дерганными. Смартфон снимает видео в 1080p@30fps.
Для меломанов Со звуковой составляющей у Huawei Nova 2 все просто отлично. Вообще, если вы выбираете смартфон Huawei на SOC Kirin, то скорее всего там по умолчанию будет отличный звук. Все благодаря фирменному аудиочипу AKM4376A с поддержкой Hi-Res Audio 24-bit/192kHz. Реально, звук в наушниках просто отличный – точно такой же, как во флагманской линейке.

Что очень важно – в смартфоне имеется аудио-разъем 3,5 мм и причем в самом правильном месте – на нижней грани!
Nova 2 снабдили качественным фирменным ПО Huawei Histen для улучшения звучания, которое реально работает и действительно улучшает параметры воспроизведения музыки, а также имеет простые и удобные настройки.
Городской стиляга Аккумулятор в смартфоне небольшой – всего 2950 мАч. Но понятно, что это плата за изящные формы и небольшую толщину корпуса.
Собственно, заурядная автономность Huawei Nova 2 напрямую вытекает из размера батарейки – 4-5 часов экрана и день работы. Потенциальный покупатель должен быть готов заряжать его раз в день и желательно иметь пауэрбанк для внештатных ситуаций, когда нет возможности вовремя добраться к розетке. Что радует – смартфон поддерживает быструю зарядку.
Для тех, кому нужно качественное и стабильное ПО Huawei Nova 2 работает на Android 7.0. Прошивка с фирменной оболочкой EMUI 5.1 очень функциональная, работает быстро и плавно, есть поддержка тем для тонкой настройки внешнего вида. Подробный обзор можно почитать тут .
Встроенный софт работает безукоризненно – быстро и очень стабильно. За все время эксплуатации я не увидел ни одного бага или глюка. Кроме того, время от времени производитель выпускает обновления для прошивки, которое прилетает на устройство “по воздуху”.
Если вы хотите просто использовать смартфон и не “париться” с софтом – смартфон Huawei – один из лучших вариантов на данный момент. В компании очень большое значение придают тестированию и доводке ПО, шлифуя его перед релизом практически до идеального состояния.
В оболочку встроена технология машинного обучения – смартфон запоминает, какие приложения вы используете чаще всего и оптимизирует их запуск. Во многом поэтому Huawei Nova 2 ощущается таким быстрым.
Дополнительно – наш видеообзор 
Итоги Честно, перед началом использования я не ожидал, что Huawei Nova 2 настолько хорош, что сможет удовлетворить меня, избалованного флагманскими смартфонами и уже порядком набившего оскомину на всевозможных устройствах. Конечно, не стоит обманываться, до топового уровня этот гаджет немного не дотягивает. Но буквально совсем немного и по мелочам. И заметить эту разницу очень сложно неискушенному пользователю. Для тех, кто хочет обновиться с устройства попроще – Huawei Nova 2 отличный выбор. И если смартфон вам понравился во время первого знакомства и цена устраивает – скорее всего вы о покупке не пожалеете.

Huawei Nova 2 Понравилось Чем не дотягивает до флагмана Дизайн Материалы Сборка Эргономика Эксплуатационные качества экрана Качество съемки двойной основной камерой Фронтальная камера 20 Мп Отличный звук Аудио-разъем 3.5 мм Точность калибровки цветопередачи дисплея Нет антиполяризации экрана Нет оптической стабилизации основной камеры Не снимает видео в качестве выше 1080p@30fps Нет модуля NFC (бесконтактные платежи)  
The post Опыт эксплуатации Huawei Nova 2 – если хочется недорогой флагман appeared first on Root Nation .

posts.author: Irony Stack
posts.title: javascript - Cursor in input field doesn't stay at the end of the text/input in mobile phones
posts.text:
I have a form where I have an input type "tel" which takes mobile numbers as inputs. In desktop and usually other mobile phones it seems to be working fine but in Samsung phones(till now) the cursor moves one position back after the 3rd input digit where regex is being used and the output number is distorted. Tried entering the phone number 1-2-3-4-5-6-7-8-9-0. On entering 1-2-3-4 it displays as (123)4. But after 4, the cursor moves one step back(at 3). Then on entering 5-6-7-8-9-0, the final output displays as (123)789-0654.
Following is the input field:
<input type="tel" id="aphonen" class="form-control" value="" data-bind="textInput: profile.phoneNumberN">
I've used JavaScript for this as follows:
$(document).ready(function() { var code; document.getElementById('aphonen').addEventListener('input', function (e) { if(code !== 8){ var a = e.target.value.replace(/\D/g, '').match(/(\d{0,3})(\d{0,3})(\d{0,4})(\d{0,4})/); e.target.value = (!a[2] ? a[1] : '(' + a[1] + ') ') + a[2] + (a[3] ? '-' + a[3] : '') + (a[4] ? '- (x' + a[4] +')' : ''); } }); window.onkeydown = function (e) { code = e.keyCode ? e.keyCode : e.which; }; });

posts.author: 허주열 기자
posts.title: 코오롱생명과학이 지난 6일 세계 최초 무릎골관절염유전자치료제인 ‘인보사-케이(Invoss
posts.text:
코오롱생명과학이 지난 6일 세계 최초 무릎골관절염유전자치료제인 ‘인보사-케이(Invossa®-K, 이하 인보사)’를 출시했다고 7일 밝혔다. 인보사는 무릎골관절염 환자의 무릎관절강 내에 단 1회 주사를 통해 직접 투여할 경우 2년 이상의 통증 및 기능개선 효과를 볼 수 있는 신개념 골관절염유전자치료제다.
인보사는 지난 7월 3개월 이상 보존적 요법(약물치료·물리치료 등)에도 불구하고 증상이 지속되는 중증도 무릎골관절염 환자를 위한 치료제로 식품의약품안전처로부터 국내 시판허가를 받았다.
/사진=코오롱생명과학 코오롱생명과학에 따르면 인보사의 상담 및 치료는 전국의 정형외과 등에서 가능하며 점차적으로 대학병원 및 종합병원으로 확대할 예정이다.
인보사는 1회 투여로 2년간 효과가 지속돼 환자가 지속적인 약물 복용 및 수술·입원·요양 등에 사용하는 총 경제적 비용에 대한 부담을 낮춰준다.
또한 관절의 염증환경을 근본적으로 개선함으로써 자신의 관절로 보다 오랜 기간 일상생활을 할 수 있어 환자의 살의 질 향상에도 도움을 줄 것으로 기대된다.
이우석 코오롱생명과학 대표는 “인보사는 2007년 임상 1상을 시작으로 2015년 임상 3상 등 총 4건의 임상시험을 통해 유효성과 안정성을 확인했으며 통증완화 및 관절기능 개선 효과가 입증됐다”며 “그동안 인보사 출시를 기다려온 의료진과 환자에게 새로운 치료 옵션을 제공할 수 있어 매우 기쁘게 생각한다”고 말했다.
실시간 재테크 경제뉴스 │ 창업정보의 모든 것
허주열 기자 sense83@mt.co.kr
<저작권자 ⓒ '성공을 꿈꾸는 사람들의 경제 뉴스' 머니S, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지>

thread.title: PM e Bombeiros decidem cruzar os braços no dia 13 caso salários não sejam pagos
thread.title_full: PM e Bombeiros decidem cruzar os braços no dia 13 caso salários não sejam pagos

posts.author: Duda Xuá (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: PM e Bombeiros decidem cruzar os braços no dia 13 caso salários não sejam pagos
posts.text:
O Fórum de Segurança Pública do Rio Grande do Norte – entidade que reúne representantes dos operadores da segurança – participará de uma grande mobilização contra atrasos de salários na próxima segunda-feira, dia 13 de novembro. Representantes de sindicatos e associações estarão juntos cobrando do Governo do Estado a divulgação do calendário e pagamento em dia. Nesta segunda-feira (6), bombeiros e policiais militares se reuniram em Assembleia Geral Unificada e deliberaram por uma paralisação no dia 13, caso até lá o salário não seja pago e nem o calendário divulgado. “O Governo diz, desde o começo de sua gestão, que a prioridade é a segurança pública, no entanto, nem mesmo o salário em dia está pagando e, pior que isso, não apresenta um cronograma. Hoje, os servidores vivem em um cenário de incertezas, contraíram dívidas e não têm mais como manter o funcionamento dos serviços sem receber. Por isso, os militares decidiram por se concentrarem em frente à Governadoria, no dia 13, e, caso o pagamento não seja feito até lá, paralisar as atividades durante esse dia”, explica Eliabe Marques, que preside a Associação dos Subtenentes e Sargentos Policiais Militares e Bombeiros Militares do RN (ASSPMBMRN). Além dos bombeiros e policiais militares, o ato do dia 13 de novembro será em conjunto também com policiais civis, que deliberaram pela participação na mobilização durante Assembleia realizada na última quarta-feira (1º). Dalchem Viana, presidente da Associação dos Bombeiros Militares do Rio Grande do Norte, ressalta que a reivindicação é justa e a decisão por paralisação dos militares é conseqüência exclusiva dos atrasos de salários. “O auxílio transporte, por exemplo, faz parte do subsídio dos militares e como o pagamento não tem sido feito a locomoção dos servidores para o trabalho tem sido comprometida”. O Fórum 
O Fórum de Segurança Pública do Rio Grande do Norte foi criado em 2015 com a missão de promover debates, traçar estratégias, ações e propostas para o aparelhamento e desenvolvimento do setor. É composto pelo Sindicato dos Servidores do Departamento de Polícia Federal do RN (Sinpef-RN), Associação dos Bombeiros Militares do RN (ABM-RN), Associação dos Cabos e Soldados da PM do RN (ACS-PMRN), Associação dos Guardas de Trânsito do RN (AGT), Associação dos Subtenentes e Sargentos Policiais Militares e Bombeiros Militares do RN (ASSPMBM-RN), Sindicato dos Agentes Penitenciários do RN (Sindasp-RN), Sindicato dos Guardas Municipais do RN (Sindguardas-RN), Sindicato dos Policiais Civis e Servidores da Segurança Pública do RN (Sinpol-RN) e Sindicato dos Policiais Rodoviários Federais do RN (Sinprf-RN). fonte:agorarn ANUNCIE AQUI LIGUE:   99433-5589. Acesse Email: xuadoagreste@hotmail.com

posts.author: Vesa Siltanen
posts.title: Rockfestilta tuli vahvistus: Ozzy Osbourne saapuu Hyvinkäälle - Inferno.fi
posts.text:
Festivaali tiedottaa samalla myös muista lisäyksistä ohjelmistoonsa. Kuva: Kristiina Lehto Jaa 
Kuten jo eilen arvelimmekin , Ozzy Osbourne saapuu Hyvinkään Rockfestien pääesiintyjäksi 6. kesäkuuta. Konsertti on osa Osbournen viimeistä, vuoteen 2020 saakka jatkuvaa maailmankiertuetta, jonka jälkeen pimeyden prinssi aikoo jättää pitkät kiertueet taakseen. Osbournen mukana Rockfestin lavalle nousevat Zakk Wylde (kitara), Blasko (basso), Tommy Clufetos (rummut) sekä Adam Wakeman (koskettimet). 
Rockfest julkisti samalla myös muitakin ensi kesän esiintyjiään, joista on jo aiemmin paljastettu muun muassa Judas Priest , Children of Bodom ja Timo Rautiainen & Trio Niskalaukaus . 6.–9. kesäkuuta pidettävien festarien ohjelmistoa vahvistamaan saapuvat myös Amaranthe , Amorphis , Avatar , Stam1na ja Von Hertzen Brothers . 
Rockfest-lippujen ennakkomyynti alkaa maanantaina 13. marraskuuta. Myyntiin voi jo rekisteröityä Rockfestin nettisivuilla .

thread.title: Tips to make peace with chemically treated hair
thread.title_full: Tips to make peace with chemically treated hair

posts.author: Tania Tarafdar
posts.title: Tips to make peace with chemically treated hair
posts.text:
/ Tips to make peace with chemically treated hair Tips to make peace with chemically treated hair If you are dwelling somewhere between the curly hair at the tips and sleek hair at the ends, these tips will make your hair look less unruly. Tania Tarafdar   1:35 pm Tags: Chemicals Hair care tips Hair smoothening Hair straightening 
Whatever method you choose to permanently straighten or relax you know that they all work by breaking the disulphide bonds in your curls to smoothen them make them straight. The straighteners may be permanent but the new growth on your hair can disrupt the sleekness. But since the full growth of hair takes time, you dwell somewhere between the unruly hair at the tips and sleek hair at the ends. If you have ever straightened your hair chemically, you will understand the struggles but beauty expert Janet Fernandez tells how you can make peace with it. 
Trim the flat bottom A little wave towards the roots is in trend, so if your chemically straighten hair is giving you one, you are in luck. But the one thing which you can do is get frequent trims and ask your stylist to texturize your ends so that the difference between the curly top and straight bottom is not visible. Think about these side effects before you choose hair straightening. 
Tailor your haircut You can opt for a haircut that will seamlessly hide the new curls. For example, if you have flat waves, you can try going for a lob. If you have a tighter coil, you can try going for the short afro style. 
Deep condition your hair As your new hair grows, do not forget to give some TLC to your weak chemically straightened hairs. Deep condition the strands every time you shampoo your hair. A good quality hair conditioner adds essential nutrients to your hair and repairs the hair follicles. Switch to a mild shampoo and conditioner. You can opt for sulphate-free shampoos as they cure the damage and reduce hair fall to a great extent. Use these 5 home-made packs to straighten your hair naturally without chemicals. 
Give some hot oil massage to your hair Hot oil treatments help the hair and scalp regain its lost moisture. Give your head a hot oil massage and cover it with a hot damp towel once a week for better results. Avoid drying your hair by rubbing it with the towel. Use a soft towel to wrap your hair and dry it. 
Image source: Shutterstock Images   1:35 pm Disclaimer: TheHealthSite.com does not guarantee any specific results as a result of the procedures mentioned here and the results may vary from person to person. The topics in these pages including text, graphics, videos and other material contained on this website are for informational purposes only and not to be substituted for professional medical advice.

posts.author: Claudia
posts.title: Mustard Seed
posts.text:
Mustard Seed 
Good morning beautiful! 
I woke up to a horrible and sleepy face because I did´t sleep that much last night because I have a lot of things in my head at the moment. I´m really tired but I´m meeting the boy for breakfast and I also have to go to the office to get some papers done. I have to take outfit photos too and I want to work out later in the afternoon so it´s going to be a pretty busy day. 
Today`s look is not that fall/winter appropriate and I wore it last week when the summer came back and stayed for a couple days. I styled a mustard yellow crop top with some mom jeans and black accessories. I love mustard and I think it´s the perfect autumn shade. On my feet I´m wearing my newest pair of black boots. They have buckles and a platform and they match my style perfectly.   guapos! 
Hoy me he despertado con muy mala cara y muchas ojeras porque he dormido fatal, tengo demasiadas cosas en la cabeza últimamente. Estoy agotada, pero he quedado para desayunar con mi chico y también tengo que pasarme por la oficina para arreglar papeles. Hoy quiero hacer fotos para el blog y entrenar esta tarde, así que me espera un día bastante completo. 
El look de hoy no es muy apropiado para esta época del año, pero me lo puse a semana pasada que tuvimos un par de días muy veraniegos. He combinado un top en amarillo mostaza con unos vaqueros mom y complementos en negro. Me encanta el amarillo mostaza y es un color que grita otoño. En los pies llevo mis nuevos botines negros. Tienen hebillas y plataforma y se adaptan a mi estilo a la perfección. ¿Qué os parece? posts.author: 新华通讯社
posts.title: 尤权任中央统战部部长_凤凰资讯
posts.text:
原标题：无党派人士、党外知识分子和新的社会阶层人士学习贯彻党的十九大精神专题座谈会在京召开 尤权主持并讲话
新华社北京11月7日电 无党派人士、党外知识分子和新的社会阶层人士学习贯彻党的十九大精神专题座谈会7日在京召开。中共中央书记处书记、中央统战部部长尤权主持并讲话。他强调，统一战线要深入学习贯彻党的十九大精神，深刻领会习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的历史地位和丰富内涵，不断巩固团结奋斗的共同思想政治基础，始终在思想上政治上行动上同以习近平同志为核心的党中央保持高度一致，为推进新时代中国特色社会主义事业凝聚广泛力量。
尤权指出，中国特色社会主义进入新时代，为广大统一战线成员施展才能、发挥作用创造了更大舞台、提出了更高要求。希望大家把个人理想、事业追求与国家发展结合起来，发挥专业优势和社会影响，宣传阐释党的十九大精神，围绕创新性发展、供给侧结构性改革、科教兴国、人才强国等重大战略部署献计出力，为实现十九大确定的新时代奋斗目标、推动党和国家事业发展作出新贡献。
无党派人士、党外知识分子和新的社会阶层人士代表在会上发言。
尤权
尤权简历
尤权，男，汉族，1954年1月生，河北卢龙人，1969年9月参加工作，1973年3月加入中国共产党，中国人民大学计划经济系国民经济计划专业毕业，研究生学历，经济学硕士学位。
1969-1976年黑龙江生产建设兵团战士、连指导员
1976-1976年北京市东城区建国门街道党委协助工作（待分配）
1976-1980年北京第一机床厂工人、组织科干事
1980-1984年中国人民大学一分校计划统计系国民经济计划专业学习
1984-1987年中国人民大学计划经济系国民经济计划专业硕士研究生
1987-1988年中国人民大学计划经济系教师
1988-1988年国务院办公厅秘书局干部
1988-1990年国务院办公厅秘书二局主任科员
1990-1992年国务院办公厅秘书二局一组副组长（副处级）
1992-1993年国务院办公厅秘书二局一组一秘（正处级）兼副组长
1993-1995年国务院办公厅秘书二局一组组长
1995-1997年国务院办公厅秘书二局助理政务专员（副局级）
1997-1998年国务院办公厅秘书二局副局长
1998-2000年国务院办公厅秘书二局局长
2000-2006年国务院副秘书长、机关党组成员
2006-2008年国家电力监管委员会主席、党组书记
2008-2012年国务院副秘书长（负责国务院办公厅常务工作，正部长级）、机关党组副书记
2012-2013年福建省委书记
2013-2017年福建省委书记、省人大常委会主任
2017年中央书记处书记，福建省委书记、省人大常委会主任
2017.10 中央书记处书记，福建省人大常委会主任
第十七届中央候补委员，十八届、十九届中央委员，十九届中央书记处书记。

thread.title: Pulwama encounter: JeM mastermind Azhar's nephew among slain terrorists | Indiablooms - First Portal on Digital News Management
thread.title_full: Pulwama encounter: JeM mastermind Azhar's nephew among slain terrorists | Indiablooms - First Portal on Digital News Management

posts.title: Pulwama encounter: JeM mastermind Azhar's nephew among slain terrorists | Indiablooms - First Portal on Digital News Management
posts.text:
Srinagar, Nov 7 (IBNS): Reports have stated that among the three slain militants in the Pulwama encounter that took place on Monday, one was Jaish-e-Muhammed chief Masood Azhar's nephew. 
He has been identified as Talha Raseed. 
Officials said that two out of the three militants were Pakistani nationals, including Raseed. 
Speaking to India Blooms, a police official said, "The bodies of all the three militants were recovered along with two AK-47 rifles and a pistol." 
According to Defence Spokesman, an army soldier, Sham Sundar of 44RR, was also killed in the gunfight. 
Azhar is a global terror mastermind who founded Jaish after securing his release following the hijack of IC 814, which took place in 1999. 
China on Thursday blocked the move to have Azhar blacklisted by the United Nations. 
India, with support of the United States, France and UK, has been taking attempts to get his name added to a UN list of groups with ties to terror organisation Al Qaeda. 
China, which is a member of the UN Security Council, has the right to veto. 
On Thursday, the country rejected the move stating "there is no consensus" on Masood Azhar's role in terror attacks in India. 
The proposal, first introduced by the Trump administration in January this year, wanted the UN to designate Azhar a global terrorist, but was put on a technical hold by China, a permanent member of the UNSC, who used its veto power. 
(Additional inputs by Saleem Iqbal Qadri) 
Pulwama encounter: JeM mastermind Azhar's nephew among slain terrorists India Blooms News Service

posts.text:
13:54 Başkan Gülmez’i gururlandıran tablo Söz Son Bölüm İzle - Söz dizisi 20. Bölüm 'Sansürsüz' 6 Kasım Pazartesi 20. Bölüm 'Sansürsüz' Yavuz hayati bir tercih yapmak zorunda kalır... Söz Son Bölüm İzle - Söz dizisi 20. Bölüm 'Sansürsüz' 6 Kasım Pazartesi 07 Kasım 2017 Salı 08:44 
Yavuz yanı başındaki Agâh tehlikesinden habersizce robot resmin olduğu dosyayı istihbarata ulaştırmak ister ancak Sancar’ı kurtarmaya gelen teröristler işleri değiştirecektir. Bu sırada karışlarında Çolak’ı bulan Tim’i ise uzun bir gece beklemektedir. Bir yanda Sancar’ı teslim etmemek ve hastanedeki sivilleri kurtarmak için uğraşan Yavuz, diğer yanda Çolak’ın restorandan yarattığı tehlikeyi önlemek için mücadele edecektir. Yavuz ve Tim’dekilere ulaşamayan Bahar, Güler’in evinde geldiğinde yabancı bir misafirle karşılaşır. Yardım eli uzattıkları bu misafirin onlar için başka planları vardır. Kafasındaki kurşunun intikamını almak isteyen Çolak Yavuz’un gelmesini beklemeden yapar hamlesini. Restorandan gelen son telefon Yavuz’u hayati bir tercih yapmak zorunda bırakacaktır. Yayın Günü: 6 Kasım Pazartesi Yayın Saati: 20:00

Carolinas Healthcare System Patient Services Specialist - Arboretum Pediatrics in Charlotte , North Carolina 
Patient Services Specialist - Arboretum Pediatrics 
Apply now » 
Location: Charlotte, NC, US, 28226 
Company: Carolinas HealthCare System 
Department Name: Clinic - Pediatric Clinic 
Location: Arboretum Pediatrics 
Assists with the front desk responsibilities of a medical practice. 
Essential Functions 
Verifies insurance and demographic information. 
Checks patients in and out and makes appointments as indicated. 
Collects co-pays and patient payments. 
Answers phones. 
Answers basic patient billing questions and/or directs to PBO/UBO. 
Monitors and resolves registration errors. 
Completes referrals and authorizations as needed. 
Assists with some financial counseling duties as needed. 
Completes charge entry in a timely manner, as needed. 
Physical Requirements 
Must be able to sit for long periods of time and work in a fast-paced office environment. Should be able to bend and lift up to 10 lbs. 
Education, Experience and Certifications 
High School Diploma or GED required. Computer experience required. Customer Service experience required. Experience with Medical Records Software preferred, Front desk practice experience preferred. 
At Carolinas HealthCare System, our patients, communities and teammates are at the center of everything we do. Our commitment to diversity and inclusion allows us to deliver care that is superior in quality and compassion across our network of more than 900 care locations. 
As a leading, innovative health system, we promote an environment where differences are valued and integrated into our workforce. Our culture of inclusion and cultural competence allows us to achieve our goals and deliver the best possible experience to patients and the communities we serve.

thread.title: Asian shares hit 10-year highs, oil slips after rally - SRN News
thread.title_full: Asian shares hit 10-year highs, oil slips after rally - SRN News

posts.title: Asian shares hit 10-year highs, oil slips after rally - SRN News
posts.text:
Enlarge 
By Lisa Twaronite 
TOKYO (Reuters) – Asian shares rallied to their highest in a decade and Japan’s Nikkei climbed to its best close since 1992 on Tuesday, while oil prices held most of their gains a day after surging to more than two-year peaks on Saudi Arabia’s anti-corruption purge. 
Futures hinted at solid openings for European bourses, with European stock futures <STXEc1>, Dax futures <FDXc1> and FTSE futures <FFIc1> and CAC futures <FCEc1> each up 0.3 percent. 
MSCI’s broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan <.MIAPJ0000PUS> extended early gains, rising 0.7 percent to its loftiest peak since November 2007. The index got a bump higher after all three major U.S. equity indexes closed at record highs overnight. 
Japan’s Nikkei <.N225> reversed early losses and finished 1.7 percent higher, on expectations of strong earnings from Japanese companies. [.T] 
“Foreign investors who were underweight on Japanese stocks in the summer are raising their investment stances to neutral and even overweight,” said Norihiro Fujito, a senior investment strategist at Mitsubishi UFJ Morgan Stanley Securities. 
Australia’s S&P/ASX 200 index <.AXJO> jumped 1 percent to a nearly 10-year high, bolstered by strong commodities prices. 
Australia’s central bank held rates at record lows for a 14th straight policy meeting on Tuesday as expected, and signaled it would stay sidelined for months to come amid stubbornly low inflation. 
U.S. crude <CLc1> shed 11 cents to $57.24 after breaking above $56 a barrel for the first time in more than two years overnight. Brent crude futures <LCOc1> were down 7 cents at $64.20. 
in Saudi Arabia, Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman’s clampdown on graft led to arrests of royalty, ministers and investors, including prominent billionaire investor Alwaleed bin Talal. 
At present, analysts do not see Saudi Arabia, the world’s largest oil exporter, changing its policy of supporting crude prices, but the crackdown has spurred concerns of Middle Eastern money pulling out of global financial markets 
“For now, concerns about the Saudi news do not appear to be weighing on U.S. shares, but if they do become a problem in the future, it could eventually have an impact on Japanese shares,” Yutaka Miura, a senior technical analyst at Mizuho Securities in Tokyo. 
The dollar index, which tracks the greenback against a basket of six major currencies, added 0.1 percent to 94.847 <.DXY>. 
Against the yen, the dollar rose 0.4 percent to 114.12 <JPY=> but remained below its eight-month high of 114.737 marked in the previous session. 
The euro edged down 0.1 percent to $1.1597 <EUR=>. 
Lower U.S. yields have also weighed on the dollar, though they rose on Tuesday in line with buoyant equity markets. 
The benchmark 10-year yield <US10YT=RR> was at 2.328 percent in Asian trading compared to 2.320 percent, its U.S. close on Monday, when it plumbed its lowest levels in two weeks. It was at a seven-month high of 2.47 percent as recently as late October. [US/] 
The lack of clarity on the progress of U.S. tax reform as well as leadership at the U.S. central bank has clouded the dollar’s outlook and kept it off its recent highs. 
Tax negotiators in the U.S. House of Representatives will seek to overcome their differences this week and work on a plan, aiming for their self-imposed deadline of passage this month. 
The Federal Reserve confirmed on Monday that influential monetary policymaker William Dudley plans to retire by mid-2018, leaving the leadership of the U.S. central bank unusually open. 
Spot gold <XAU=> was down 0.2 percent at $1,278.65 per ounce after gaining nearly one percent in the previous session, easing in line with firmer Asian equities markets. [GOL/] 
(Additional reporting by Ayai Tomisawa in Tokyo; Editing by Sam Holmes and Richard Borsuk)

thread.title: 7 reasons why your child wakes up in the middle of the night
thread.title_full: 7 reasons why your child wakes up in the middle of the night

posts.author: Debjani Arora
posts.title: 7 reasons why your child wakes up in the middle of the night
posts.text:
/ 7 reasons why your child wakes up in the middle of the night 7 reasons why your child wakes up in the middle of the night There could be many, these are the commonest. Debjani Arora   1:29 pm Tags: Baby sleep Bottle feeding Cold Cough Diaper rashes Tips for baby care 
Babies don’t sleep through the night and this is something every parent has to deal with. Sleepless nights, fragmented sleep, are all too common with new parents. Most of them think that it is hunger which makes their baby wake up in the middle of the night. Well, one can’t deny that part, because babies do feel hungry frequently and you have to wake up from your sleep to feed them. But hunger isn’t the only reason to make your baby wake up and wail. We spoke to Dr Suresh Gowda, consultant neonatologist and paediatrician, Motherhood Hospitals Mumbai what are the reasons that make a baby wake up and cry in the night. Here is what he has to say: 
Teething: Growing a mouthful of teeth is hard work for a baby and let’s not forget to mention painful too. So, if your baby has started showing signs of teething like you can feel the sharp teeth buds when you touch the jaws or if they have already erupted, know that your child is facing some discomforts. They would mostly break into a crying spell and can be difficult to soothe. But it isn’t just the daytime which makes things miserable for them. Sometimes the pain can occur at night too making a baby wake up from a restful sleep and cry out loud. Here are five things that happen to your baby while teething. 
Diaper problems: Wet bottoms are one of the most common reasons to make your child wake up in the middle of the night. So make sure you change your baby’s diaper often, especially if you are using cloth nappies, else switch to a long-lasting diaper for the nights. Here are five things to keep in mind if you are using cloth diapers. 
Daytime naps: We feel no matter when a baby sleeps it is good and essential for the baby. It gives the child enough rest to rejuvenate and continue being a bundle of energy. But the fact is, nighttime sleep is essential than daytime sleep. So, if your baby has been sleeping for long hours in the day, especially close to dinnertime or sleep time. This could mean disturbed sleep for the baby at night who is also trying hard to fall back into a restful slumber all over again. 
Mundane discomforts: Problems like a cough and cold make it too uncomfortable for your baby to sleep at night. A blocked nose, wheezing, cough can make your baby wake up in the night. Sometimes post vaccination pain can also be the culprit. Here are five ways to use ajwain to treat cold and cough in babies. 
Digestive issues (like gas or reflux): Gas and reflux can be very painful for a baby and it will disrupt the night’s peaceful sleep. In very small babies colic can be a reason for sleep disturbance. 
Overheat or cold: Babies find it difficult to adjust to the change in weather. So it is essential to dress your baby accordingly during the day and at night. Overdressing them to address the cold can suffocate them and underdressing can make them cold and uncomfortable. So, always dress them accordingly. Opt for cotton clothing for bedtime and keep the AC at a temperature that is pleasant for the baby. 
Hunger: Of course, this cannot escape this list. Newborn babies need food round the clock. Also, older babies need one feeding at night at least. Hunger is a valid reason for babies to wake up at night. 
Image source: Shutterstock   1:29 pm Disclaimer: TheHealthSite.com does not guarantee any specific results as a result of the procedures mentioned here and the results may vary from person to person. The topics in these pages including text, graphics, videos and other material contained on this website are for informational purposes only and not to be substituted for professional medical advice.

thread.title_full: 無我 - 2000 김돈규 : 네이버 블로그

posts.author: 뉴뮤직
posts.title: 無我 - 2000 김돈규
posts.text:
뮤직앨범소개 無我 - 2000 김돈규 50분 전 URL 복사 본문 기타 기능 번역보기 http://blog.naver.com/newmusicac/221134703512
김돈규는 그룹 공일오비의 < 4th movement> 에서 ' 신인류의 사랑 ' 과 < Big 5> 앨범의 리메이크 곡인 ' 단발머리 ' 와 ' 슬픈 인연 ' 을 객원 가수로 히트시키는데 일조 했고 장호일의 첫 솔로 작품 < Kloma> 에서도 역시 객원 가수로 활동한 뒤 자신의 첫 솔로 앨범에서 ' 나만의 슬픔 ' 으로 알려졌다 .
후에 자신이 프로듀스한 2 번째 앨범에서 에스더와 ' 다시 태어나도 ' 를 불러 세인의 주목을 끌은 바 있고 각종 컴필레이션 앨범을 통해 명함을 내민 경력이 있다 . ' 나만의 슬픔 ' 을 작곡한 이경섭과 다시 손잡은 ' 단 ' 을 비롯해 자신이 작곡한 ' 투정 ' 등의 곡은 이번에도 별다른 특성을 보여주지 못한 채 개성 없는 곡들 속에서 허우적거리는 느낌을 지울 수가 없다 . 또한 과거의 앨범에서 빌려온 많은 곡들은 상대적으로 프로답지 못한 근성으로 앨범의 약점을 더하고 있다 .
그의 목소리는 조성모 보다 뚜렷하며 뛰어난 음감을 지니고 있지만 1 집의 ' 집에 가지마 ' 나 재수록된 ' 3 분 45 초간의 고백 ' 처럼 빠른 곡 이외엔 어떠한 호소력도 표출하지 못한다 . 그는 발라드를 주무기로 추구하는 것에서 빠져 나와 그를 부각시킬 쪽은 경쾌한 리듬이 있는 곡이라는 것을 재고해 봐야 한다 .
- 수록곡 -
1. 소나무 ( Intro)
2. 투정
3. 왜 그래
4. I Promise You
5. 哀離 ( 애리 )
6. 웨딩
7. 但 ( 단 )
8. 反心向饒 ( 반심향요 )
9. 사랑할 수 있도록
10. 3 분 45 초간의 고백
11. 풍경화속의 거리
12. 그대가 나에게
13. 다시 태어나도
14. 미워도 다시 한 번
15. 슬픈 운명
동영상 트윈폴리오 - 슬픈운명 youtu.be 이 글은 제가 쓴 글이 아니며
네오 뮤직 커뮤니티 izm 의 팝뮤직 리뷰로써
저희 학원학생들이 팝음악을 좀 더 알아갔으면 하는 취지에서 저희블로그에 가져왔습니다 .
